name: Jason Seawall
title: CEO at Numurus.  20 years advancing robotic and smart sensing solutions.
about:
Throughout my 20+ years in technology development, I've observed a fundamental challenge: brilliant people are held back by technical complexity when trying to implement AI and automation solutions. At Numurus, we're changing that.

My journey began with founding BlueView Technologies (acquired by Teledyne in 2012), where I witnessed firsthand how organizations struggle to bridge the gap between cutting-edge technology and practical implementation. This experience inspired our work at Numurus, where we've developed turnkey smart data solutions that make AI accessible without requiring specialized programming skills.

I believe that implementing AI should be as intuitive as installing a smartphone app. When researchers can focus on discoveries rather than code, when educators can prepare students for the future workforce without technical barriers, and when businesses can deploy smart systems without programming expertise—that's when innovation truly accelerates.

Our team has created solutions that now help organizations across sectors transform how they collect and process data, automate critical operations, and make decisions in real time.

If you're looking to accelerate your organization's adoption of AI without the typical technical hurdles, let's connect. After all, the most powerful technologies should be accessible to those solving important problems, not just those with specialized coding skills. Reach out at info@numurus.com.

name: Jerome Barraquand
title: Founder at Thinking Engines
about:
Jerome's experience spans entrepreneurship and research in financial services and artificial intelligence. His current research focuses on applications of deep learning to natural language understanding and time series analysis.

Most recently he led the development of financial services products and solutions at Element AI, a Montreal based deep learning startup co-founded by Turing award laureate Yoshua Bengio. He worked with top tier banks, asset managers, and hedge funds across North America, Europe, and Asia-Pacific, on defining the future of AI-based financial services.

Entrepreneurial experiences include Quasar, a quantitative hedge fund, and GlobeOp, which became the largest hedge fund service provider. GlobeOp delivers cloud based risk management and middle and back office services to some of the world's largest and most complex hedge funds and asset managers. 

His research experience spans quantitative financial modeling, risk management and dynamic portfolio allocation, computer vision, robotics, simulation-based planning, oil exploration, and natural language understanding, most recently using deep learning. 

Jerome also worked in investment banking, where he held various positions in quantitative research, structured product pricing, and proprietary trading, notably with Salomon Brothers’ bond arbitrage group.

He started his career in academic research into artificial intelligence at INRIA, Stanford University, and Digital Equipment Corporation. He holds a PhD in artificial intelligence. Jerome is also a venture partner at Blackfin Tech fund.
experience_2_company: BlackFin Capital Partners | Investors in Financial Services
notable_achievements: Co-authored influential research on numerical valuation of high dimensional multivariate American securities; Contributed to advancements in optimal stopping problems and financial option pricing models
reasoning: Jerome Barraquand demonstrates a strong combination of technical expertise, entrepreneurial experience, and successful exits. His involvement with GlobeOp, which became the largest hedge fund service provider, and his role in Element AI (acquired by ServiceNow for $700M) show proven operational experience at scale. His background combines academic research (PhD in AI), entrepreneurial ventures, and executive roles in significant financial institutions. name: Alex Israel
title: Co-Founder & CEO at Metropolis
about:
Alex is the Co-Founder and CEO of Metropolis, an artificial intelligence company using computer vision to power checkout-free payment experiences in the real world. 

He led Metropolis through a $1.8B growth buyout of a 100-year-old legacy company—the largest M&A transaction ever by a venture-backed company. Backed by leading investors including Eldridge, BDT & MSD, Temasek, Silver Lake, Dragoneer, and 3L, Metropolis now operates across 4,500 locations globally, serves over 50 million customers, and processes more than $5B in payments annually. The company is rapidly expanding into retail, hospitality, access, and safety.

Alex previously co-founded ParkMe, which was acquired by Microsoft spinoff INRIX in 2015. He is a 2024 EY Entrepreneur of the Year and a proud Angeleno.

name: Peter Fisher
title: Co-Founder & CCO at Metropolis
about:
Peter Fisher is an entrepreneur, investor and former financial services professional. He is the Co-Founder of Metropolis Technologies.

Prior to founding Metropolis, Peter worked in corporate management and financial services. Peter most recently served as an executive at Global Airtech, a privately-held aviation brokerage and fleet management company based in Los Angeles. In this role, he was responsible for the company’s strategic vision and helped lead the firm’s global business development opportunities. 

Prior to Global Airtech, Peter was a Portfolio Manager and Senior Equity Analyst for a $30 billion growth equity team at Transamerica Investment Management. He held portfolio management responsibilities for the firm’s global growth equity fund. In 2006, Peter was promoted to a senior equity analyst and was responsible for overseeing the firm’s investments in Telecommunications, Media, and Technology (“TMT”) companies. During this time, the firm allocated more than $1 billion into Amazon, Google, Priceline, Netflix, and Disney.

Peter’s finance career started at WestCap Investors in 2003. WestCap was a boutique investment management firm that focused on growth equity investments. In 2004, WestCap was acquired by Transamerica Investment Management.

Mr. Fisher completed a Bachelor of Arts in Political Science from Boston College.

name: Stephen Odaibo
title: CEO & Founder RETINA-AI Health, Inc. | Retina Specialist | Healthcare AI expert | Math/Comp Sci. | AI Engineer
about:
Dr. Stephen G. Odaibo is CEO and Founder of RETINA-AI Health, Inc. He is a Physician, Retina Specialist, Computer Scientist, Full Stack AI Engineer, and AI/ML expert.

Dr. Odaibo completed undergraduate in mathematics at Univ of Alabama (UAB) and medical school at Duke University, where he won the Barrie Hurwitz Award for Excellence in Neurology.  He completed ophthalmology residency at Howard and Retina fellowship at Univ of Michigan.  In addition to his medical training, he holds Masters Degrees in both Mathematics and Computer Science.  In 2017, UAB college of Arts and Sciences awarded him the college’s highest honor--the UAB Distinguished Alumni Achievement Award.  Dr. Odaibo has authored three mathematics textbooks: "Quantum Mechanics and the MRI Machine" (2012),  "The Form of Finite Groups: A Course on Finite Group Theory" (2016), and most recently, "The Foundational Mathematics of Artificial Intelligence" (2024).

Dr. Odaibo has extensive experience in building AI systems and running AI ventures.  Dr. Odaibo is a hands-on full-stack AI/ML engineer and data scientist.  He is a Google Cloud-Certified Professional Cloud Cybersecurity Engineer.  He single-handedly built the world's first mobile AI application for eyecare providers.  He is CEO of RETINA AI—a venture where he and his team designed the RETINA-AI Galaxy for detection of diabetic retinopathy.  As CEO of RETINA-AI, he organized and managed the largest pivotal clinical trial ever done in the United States for an autonomous AI system.  His managerial role has garnered him extensive skill in recruitment and management of tech teams.  He additionally has expertise in the regulatory and legal aspects of AI-- Dr. Odaibo was awarded two U.S. patents for inventing AI systems for detecting disease from ophthalmic images.

His expertise has been sought out across the globe.  Dr. Odaibo chaired and ran the AI workshops at the Medical Device Software Development Summits in the United States (2022, 2023) and European Union (2023).  He has also shared his AI expertise in Asia. In 2019 Dr. Odaibo chaired the "Artificial Intelligence & Tech in Medicine Symposium" at the National Medical Association Meeting. He serves on the Advisory Board of the Duke University Masters of Engineering in Artificial Intelligence program.

Overall, Dr. Odaibo has extensive experience in AI at the technical, managerial, and regulatory levels.  He continues to see patients part time as a Retina Physician, and he enjoys the privilege of providing excellent care to his patients.

about:
What an exciting era to be part of! We are at the forefront of remarkable technological advancements, even as we navigate unprecedented challenges like the pandemic, climate change, and global tensions that impact supply chains and consumer behavior. Growing up in a middle-class German family, I realized early on the privilege of my background and the inevitable societal shifts ahead—understanding our origins and future paths is vital for success, irrespective of heritage.

I firmly believe that every individual possesses immense potential, often hindered by circumstances or lack of guidance. Our innovative virtual style consultant and product recommendation engine is now available to apparel and eyewear retailers via API, bridging the gap in professional customer service. This approach boosts customer engagement and confidence, reducing cart abandonment and increasing conversions, ultimately benefiting retailers' bottom lines.

name: Alex Circei
title: CEO & Co-Founder at Waydev
about:
I’m a builder at heart. For the past 17+ years, I’ve been deep in the startup world - scaling teams, and solving messy problems with real impact. I founded Waydev to help engineering leaders understand what’s actually happening in their dev teams, and we’ve grown it into a platform used by Fortune 500s.

Before Waydev, I led product and tech teams across multiple startups. I’ve been through the highs, the crashes, and everything in between. Applied to Y Combinator 13 times before getting in. I don’t believe in overnight success - just relentless iteration.

I’m a member of the Forbes Tech Council, and I’ve published 50+ articles in places like Forbes, TechCrunch, and HackerNoon (where I was named Contributor of the Year for Agile & engineering leadership). I speak at events, write when I can, and share what I learn - especially when it’s hard.

Outside work, I’ve finished 7 Ironman races. The mindset that gets you through mile 130 is the same one that gets you through year 7 of a startup: show up, even when it’s brutal.

These days, I split my time between building, writing, and enjoying life with my amazing wife around the Bay Area.

about:
I'm a Co-Founder and CEO of 7 Chord, a market data, pricing, and analytics firm in NYC. BondDroid AI, 7 Chord's flagship product, is a real-time dynamic pricing engine that empowers traders and investors with timely access to highly accurate market-relevant prices. Powered by continuous learning technology, initially developed by our co-founders at NYU, BondDroid adapts swiftly to unexpected market changes. BondDroid is used by Fortune 500 firms and up-and-coming leaders around the globe.

7 Chord is an alumn of Barclays Accelerator, powered by TechStars, Class of 2017, and a data provider to FintechSandbox. 7 Chord was named one of the "Most Promising Fintech Companies to Watch" by Harrington Starr in 2022 and 2019 and won a prestigious "Excellence in AI" award from Markets Media in 2019. It was Benzinga Fintech Listmaker in the "Best in AI" category in 2020 and 2019. 

Before 7 Chord, I spent 20+ years in credit trading and market structure roles, most recently at BlackRock and JP Morgan. I'm a financial quant by background and earned an MSc in Finance from the London School of Economics and a BA in Economics from NYU. 

I was born in the former USSR and moved to the US in the mid-90s after witnessing the country's economic collapse and hyperinflation.

name: Subir Bhattacharjee
title: Driving breakthrough innovations at the intersection of water, sustainability, and advanced materials.
about:
As a technology entrepreneur at the intersection of water, sustainability, and intelligent systems, I focus on transforming how we treat and manage process industry, particularly water treatment through advanced materials, algorithmic intelligence-driven automation, and smart system integration. My career has spanned scaling (and founding) multiple ventures that merge cutting-edge science with real-world impact in global water infrastructure.

As the Founder & CEO of IntelliFlux Controls, I led the development and commercialization of APRICOT — an industrial automation and digitalization software platform that optimizes process plant operations in near-real time. IntelliFlux was spun out of Water Planet, Inc., and has been deployed across industrial, municipal, and energy sector to reduce operational costs, extend asset life, and ensure regulatory compliance.

At Active Membranes, Inc., in the role of CTO, I guide a talented team pioneering electroactive membrane technologies. Our patented smart RO membranes use tunable electric fields to dynamically enhance desalination performance, reduce fouling, and enable selective ion separation — pushing the boundaries of what’s possible in membrane science and seawater treatment.

As the Founder & CEO of Envivaqua LLC I provide services dedicated to solving the complex challenges facing 21st-century process industries by driving sustainable transformation in water, energy, and environmental management. We deliver strategic advisory services, deploy advanced technologies, and lead digital transformation initiatives that help our industrial clients optimize operations, reduce environmental footprint, and future-proof their infrastructure.

Prior to joining IntelliFlux, I was the co-founder and Chief Technology Officer of Water Planet, Inc., a Los Angeles based water technology and industrial water management company, which I co-founded in 2011. Water Planet  specialized in design, engineering, and manufacturing of integrated separation technologies for water treatment.

Before founding these companies, I was a Professor of Mechanical Engineering at the University of Alberta, Canada, where I held a Canada Research Chair in interfacial and colloidal systems for water and energy applications. I’ve published over 100 peer-reviewed articles, co-authored three books, and hold multiple patents in water treatment technologies.

name: Earl R.
title: President @ U SCOPE | Photo Cataloging Camera App for the Trade
about:
As the co-founder of PHOTO iD by U Scope, I am passionate about transforming the property inspection industry with innovative and efficient solutions. I have over 18 years of experience as an insurance adjuster, witnessing firsthand the challenges and frustrations of traditional methods of inspection. With a degree in Mechanical Drafting and Mechanical Drafting CAD/CADD from American Institute of Design, I have the technical skills and knowledge to design and develop cutting-edge inspection tools that leverage the power of mobile technology and data analytics.

PHOTO iD by U Scope is the first revolutionary product of our company, a photo management and a custom inspection report documentation platform that enables adjusters, contractors, and field service reps to capture, label, and organize their inspection images in a more streamlined fashion. With just a single touch of the mobile phone's inspection camera screen, our users can save time and be more productive, inspecting an average of 2 to 4 more properties on a daily basis. Our inspection platform also has a virtual inspection tool that allows our users to communicate remotely with property owners, providing a better customer experience. Our vision is to bring property inspections into the 21st century, and we are constantly working on improving and expanding our features and services.

name: Chris Olson
title: Gaming & Tech Leader 🎮 Head of Product Management ★ Mobile, F2P, PC & Console Games ★ Product, Team & Business Leader ★ EX-SEGA ★ Player Engagement & Monetization ★ Creator of Happy Work Places
about:
As a lifelong gamer, it’s amazing to me that I’ve been able to forge a career where pixels come to life and virtual worlds electrify millions. I always seek to push the boundaries of what's possible in interactive entertainment and feel privileged to have collaborated with many amazing people over the years.

✅ DRIVER OF INNOVATION AND GROWTH
A start-up began with two friends’ desire to “git gud” at Overwatch, the plan hashed out over many meetings huddled in Starbucks. It ended with a product that is synonymous with FPS excellence. I wanted to harness data to empower gamers; skilling them up in a fun way and enhancing their enjoyment of the games they love to play.

The result? KovaaK’s is a platform that has maintained an "Overwhelmingly Positive" Steam rating year after year. This success was the product of relentless iteration and innovation, from securing rounds of VC funding to forging partnerships with industry giants like NVIDIA and releasing new features like an in-game map editor to turbocharge UGC to over 200K scenarios and playlists.

✅ SOLVER OF COMPLEX PROBLEMS
My passion for innovation didn't start there. At SEGA, I led the company's growth into mobile gaming by establishing a new business unit (SEGA Networks). The work wasn't just about creating games; it was about managing a pivot for a large gaming company while managing a product portfolio for three internal studios.

To scale, I introduced new strategic business functions like business intelligence, consumer insights, live operations, and product management.

The result? Launched 11 games in 24 months, earning millions in annual revenue.

✅ PASSIONATE SEEKER OF FUN
 Work and play shouldn’t be mutually exclusive, especially in games. At my last fully remote company, I tackled the challenge of team bonding by organizing online events: 1:1 coffee sessions, virtual escape rooms, trivia challenges and, of course, online FPS deathmatches. The resultant camaraderie helped keep attrition rates low for years. At SEGA, I was known for hosting “mandatory fun” sessions that brought teams together to mix and mingle.

When I'm not revolutionizing the gaming industry, I’m teaching my adopted pets new tricks or exploring the vineyards of Napa and Sonoma.

My curiosity knows no bounds—I've recently delved into the world of AI, earning a certificate in artificial intelligence fundamentals.

With a skill set spanning game development, product management, marketing, and team leadership, I'm always looking for the next big challenge.

Hit me up if you want to grab coffee and/or chat:  xispolson@gmail.com
notable_achievements: Built and sold custom high-end motorcycles; Co-founded Drive Capital, a private investment firm; Co-founded The Media Trust and shaped its vision; Partner at Sequoia Capital for 6 years; Investment professional at Technology Crossover Ventures
reasoning: Chris Olson demonstrates proven operational experience with notable achievements in both startup and established gaming companies. His role at SEGA Networks shows executive-level experience scaling a business unit, while his work with KovaaK's indicates successful product leadership and funding acquisition. The combination of corporate success at SEGA and startup experience with measurable outcomes places him solidly in the L4 category as a Proven Operator with significant executive experience.

Founder & CEO Stick Sports Ltd free-to-play mobile sports-based games.

about:
Founder & CEO of Stick Sports Ltd and driving force behind its strategy and innovation, I have more than 15 years’ experience in the games industry as well as a background in commercial management, and a deep understanding of marketing, finance and the design process. I founded my first games company in 2004, an advergaming agency that designed and launched more than 50 web games and campaigns for brands and media platforms. In 2006 I launched Stick Sports with the aim of building a global niche in casual sports games. I strongly believe that the next natural step for the games industry lies in giving players real game-asset ownership. My vision is to introduce the benefits of blockchain tech to gamers through a rebooted version of Stick Cricket, with a focus on maintaining all the fun and playability that characterises our franchise.

Fascinated by AI, consciousness, and the nature of our reality. 

I believe that we’re staring head-on at the biggest societal change humanity has ever encountered. AI will upend our work, our social ladder, and how people find meaning. name: Siddharth Gupta
title: CEO @ Granular | Interrogating Earth with AI | Techstars Boston | National Geospatial Intelligence Agency Accelerator
about:
Advancing Earth Intelligence Through Earth Imaging at Granular

I am Siddharth Gupta, CEO of Granular. With a foundation in geospatial artificial intelligence initially co-developed with the U.S. Air Force, Granular is dedicated to simplifying Earth intelligence. Our technology translates complex earth observation data into actionable insights for businesses and governments alike.

Mission at Granular
We believe that as the planet undergoes unprecedented changes, robust, and precise Earth imaging data becomes critical for a multitude of sectors. Through our platforms, we're democratizing access to such data, making it simpler and more actionable for decision-makers.

Core Products
GeoEngine: Designed for structured, lean GeoAI R&D, this tool is at the heart of our mission to simplify Earth intelligence.
GeoSearch: An intuitive interface enabling non-technical users to make sense of earth observation data.

Experience and Publications
As a leader in this field, I've contributed to the academic and practical discourse through various publications, which can be found on my Google Scholar profile. My work has been centered around the applications of GeoAI in real-world scenarios, ranging from environmental monitoring to urban planning.

Vision for the Future
Our aim is to continue being a transformative force in Earth intelligence, adapting to the rapidly evolving technological and environmental landscape to provide timely, accurate, and accessible data solutions.

name: Chandler Schaak
title: Founder & CEO at Hindsight.vip | Simplifying Blockchain for All | Driving Innovation in Transaction Transparency & Security
about:
The idea behind Hindsight.vip came from a personal experience that wasn’t a dramatic "light bulb" moment but something that evolved over time. I developed a habit of writing my notes in symbols rather than words(As someone with dyslexia). When giving speeches, I didn’t want to read directly from cards; instead, I used symbols to help me stay on track with key points.

As I Immersed myself in the blockchain, I was overwhelmed by the long strings of hashes. These hashes made it difficult to quickly differentiate between a wallet and a smart contract. I knew there had to be a better way to simplify things and make blockchain more user-friendly.

At the same time, I noticed how rampant scams were in the blockchain space, particularly when I was involved with Female DAO NFTs. People were getting scammed by fake websites, and I realised we needed a way for users to flag problematic addresses. Once someone falls victim to a scam, they should have the ability to report it, and others should be able to see that warning before interacting with that address.

This combination of my personal experience and a growing need for transparency led to the creation of Hindsight.vip— a platform that simplifies blockchain by turning complex data into easy-to-understand visuals and giving users the tools to report and avoid scams.
speaking_engagements: Interested in working with colleges to introduce blockchain visualization technology to supply chain classes
notable_achievements: Recognized by Marquis Who’s Who for expertise in blockchain technology; Founder and CEO of HindSight VIP Inc., focused on making blockchain technology accessible
reasoning: Based on the available information, this founder appears to be a nascent entrepreneur with minimal professional experience. The profile suggests they are a first-time founder working on Hindsight.vip, with their main experience being the creation of this current venture. The background story indicates they came up with the idea through personal experience with blockchain and identified a market need, which is characteristic of an L1 founder. Their educational background in fintech from UW and their focus on blockchain technology shows potential, but there's no evidence of prior successful ventures or significant professional experience.

about:
With over 10 years of experience in an executive role in technology real estate investment and development, and insurance, I am the Co-Founder and CEO of Obie, a Y Combinator-backed startup that is reimagining insurance and risk management for real estate investors. Obie leverages data and technology to provide tailored and affordable coverage for SFR, STR, and multifamily properties, as well as the surrounding businesses. 

As the leader of Obie, I oversee the vision, strategy, and execution of the company, while also managing the relationships with investors, partners, and customers. I have a strong background in Multifamily and commercial real estate valuation, underwriting, asset management, and fundraising having worked at Hudson Capital Investments and as an Investment Analyst at Ram Real Estate. I also run my own small investment and consulting firm, MAC Properties, where I sponsor and advise on SFR and multifamily deals across the Southeast and Midwest. I have a Master's degree in Architecture from Clemson University and a Bachelor's degree in Science from Michigan State University.  I am passionate about creating innovative and sustainable solutions for the built world, and I am always eager to learn from and collaborate with other professionals and experts in the field. My goal is to make Obie the leading insurance platform for real estate investors, and to empower them to protect and grow their assets.

title: Field CTO QuSecure, Former CEO, CIO, CTO, CRO, CMO, CSO, Chair Band of Angels, Board Member, Venture Investor, Stanford StartX Founder
about:
Dave Krauthamer is an Information systems executive who is an experienced CEO, CIO, CTO, CRO, CMO, CSO and serves as a Board Member and Chairman of the Digital Disruption Group at the Band of Angels. He has created and sold award-winning companies in addition to teaching university-level courses in information technology. 

Dave holds a degree in Computer Science. He loves working with people and is passionate about helping companies create incredible products, amazing brands, powerful marketing stories, and high-performance sales teams

He has extensive experience in Quantum Computing, Artificial Intelligence, Cybersecurity, Product Innovation, Marketing, Sales, M&A, in addition to a wide background in the implementation of enterprise-wide systems.

Dave currently serves as CEO of QuSecure. QuSecure offers QuProtect – proven, adaptive, quantum-resilient cybersecurity software that protects your data wherever and whenever it travels. With attack intelligence and monitoring, QuProtect acts as the “easy button” making mandatory upgrades simple while integrating seamlessly with today’s – as well as yesterday’s – technology.

QuSecure gives cybersecurity leaders the protection, assurance, and confidence they need so their organizations are ready for today. 

He is also the founder of NEURAL SALES an intelligent (AI) solution that evaluates all aspects of your market in real time and learns from your interactions, successes, and setbacks.

Prior to that, Dave created an award-winning company named Intelenex which became a leading partner in the transformation of Corporate Systems to the Cloud. Intelenex was recognized as Oracle's Top Cloud ERP Sales Partner in 2015. Closing the year by selling almost 50% more Cloud ERP licenses than any other partner.

Intelenex was also acknowledged as being one of the fastest growing service companies in the country by Inc. Magazine ranking 364 out of the top 5000. The company was sold in July of 2015.

name: Lyle Maxson
title: Founder and CEO of Above Technologies
about:
Lyle Maxson is a technologist and cultural architect working at the intersection of immersive technology, AI, biofeedback, mental health, and education. As a pioneer of the benevolent technology movement, Lyle brings over a decade of experience creating transformative experiences that merge science, storytelling, and systems design.

He began his career in the music festival world, founding The Courtiers, a creative agency that brought immersive art, sponsorship activations, and experiential design to large-scale live events. His collaborations with Insomniac, Live Nation, and AEG helped reimagine the festival experience as a platform for collective transformation.

Lyle went on to found Andromeda Entertainment, the first VR publishing label for “games for good,” where he published titles like Audio Trip and Shadowgate with leading studios and platforms. He also co-founded SoundSelf, a digital therapeutics company that coined the concept of digital psychedelics—voice-activated biofeedback experiences designed to guide users into altered states. SoundSelf has completed mutliple clinical trials and is on track toward FDA approval for the treatment of mental health conditions.

In 2021, Lyle co-founded GeniusX, securing a major grant from Meta and sparking industry-wide dialogue around the future of immersive, gamified learning.

Lyle then went on to co-found Sorceri, a custom development studio at the forefront of AI and spatial computing. Sorceri’s clients have included publicly traded companies, top-selling VR experiences, and household wellness brands, helping mission-driven teams build world-class tools at the edge of neuroscience, mindfulness, and behavior change.

Across ventures, Lyle has served as the creator, business development lead, and strategic architect behind some of the most forward-thinking platforms in wellness and tech. He has spoken on global stages including the UN General Assembly and Davos and has been featured in publications including BBC and Rolling Stone on the future of ethical, human-centered innovation.

Lyle is now the founder and CEO of ABOVE, a wearable AI company defining the category of emotional intelligence through a new frontier he calls “Reflective AI.” ABOVE offers real-time, context-aware guidance powered by voice and emotional data—supporting users in becoming more present, connected, and self-aware. Backed by leaders in wellness, design, and artificial intelligence, ABOVE is the culmination of Lyle’s mission to build technologies that don’t just optimize performance—but awakens potential.
speaking_engagements: Live Heroes of Reality Podcast appearance; Guest on The Psychedelic Therapy Podcast discussing digital therapeutics and immersive technology
reasoning: Lyle Maxson demonstrates a pattern of successful company founding and operation in emerging technology sectors, particularly in VR, wellness, and AI. He has founded multiple ventures (The Courtiers, Andromeda Entertainment, SoundSelf, GeniusX, Sorceri, and now ABOVE) with evidence of meaningful traction and industry impact. name: John Golden
title: Founder/Author/Owner
about:
John Golden, Ed.D. is the President and Founder of Golden LLC, a psychological assessment publishing company with a legacy spanning more than 50 years. Dr. Golden is the developer and author of a proprietary line of personality and values assessments for adults and teenagers. Golden LLC publishes online assessments in the United States that have been used by millions of people around the world and are licensed to a host of prestigious international psychological test publishing companies in more than a dozen foreign languages. A central theme among his assessments is their positive and developmental focus designed to help people and the organizations in which they work improve, grow and succeed through a special focus on the practical and beneficial application of accurate self-knowledge and exploration.
 
Dr. Golden’s educational background includes a unique blend of psychology, education and human resource management. His professional practice includes organizational change and development consulting and training with a core specialty in the application of psychological assessments in executive coaching, career development, leadership, management development, team building, organizational culture business and ethics. He has authored numerous technical manuals and support guides and worked personally with tens of thousands of people in hundreds of organizations in for-profit, non-profit, education, government and military industrial settings. Dr. Golden has also held a university faculty position as a Professor of Management - Lutgert College of Business Florida Gulf Coast University
 
Developer/Author: Golden Personality Profiler, aka, the Golden Profiler of Personality (GPOP) in Germany, Golden Inventory of Personality Development (GIPD) in France;  Golden Student Profiler (GSP); Values Arrangement List (VAL); Values Arrangement List for Teens (VAL for Teens); Values Arrangement List for Organizations (VALOR); Boundless Diversity - an introduction to the Golden Personality Type Profiler.   He is a co-developer of the PrinciplesYou personality assessment in partnership with Ray Dalio, Dr. Adam Grant and Dr. Brian Little.
speaking_engagements: Guest on Drop In CEO podcast discussing leadership and self-awareness
reasoning: Dr. Golden has demonstrated significant success as a founder in the psychological assessment industry, building a sustainable business over 50+ years with international reach and millions of users. While not a typical tech startup exit case, he has shown proven operational excellence in building and scaling a specialized B2B company. His work with Ray Dalio and development of widely-adopted assessment tools demonstrates strong execution and industry leadership. The classification as L4 reflects his proven operator status and successful business building, though without clear evidence of major exits or unicorn-scale outcomes that would justify a higher classification.

name: Jesse Golden
title: Founder & CEO of The Golden Secrets
about:
Devoted Mother, model, Hatha yoga teacher, holistic health practitioner, and creator of The Golden Secrets, Jesse Golden has used her multi-faceted career as a platform to inspire and empower people all over the world. 
Jesse's accomplishments began at an early age, when, as a child, she became a ballerina in her Mother’s dance studio. After putting the debilitating disease rheumatoid arthritis into remission through natural methods, Jesse has established herself as the face of hope in the health and fitness industry. She continues to thrive despite her diagnosis.
Not having the ability to answer all the emails and calls she receives from people asking for help, Jesse started The Golden Secrets to share the tools and tips that she has acquired, both from her journey back to health and through her life experiences.
Jesse believes that every challenge we encounter is an opportunity for us to create more light for ourselves and for our world. The Golden Secrets is about health, beauty, fitness, parenting, spirituality, elevating consciousness, and empowering you to find your own path to fulfillment and optimal wellness.

name: Frank Casale
title: Revenue Accelerator, Conflicted Futurist, AI Sales Leader and influencer, AI for Mental Health, Veteran Support, Trusted Fractional CXO Advisor, Force Multiplier,, Empathic/Agentic AI, 150K contacts worldwide, Foodie.
about:
"Pardon The Disruption Episode 19: Predicting The Future With Frank Casale" https://youtu.be/8Lo7uX9QS4Y 



Here come the robots !
Welcome to the digital wild west.  Winners and losers will be determined by who has the best and most trusting relationships, the best tech and talent - along with access to the right global ecosystems and channels.
As an early pioneer and recognized thought leader in RPA and AI arena I am expert in both the selling and buying process.  
Hence I continue to assist both sides.  My relationships and access in this industry are second to none.   
I’ve launched several global member networks which collectively number over 100k business and tech decision makers. My focus is RPA, Intelligent automation and AI. My team and I have extensive experience helping new players go to market. We also assist global 2000 enterprises to better understand, exploit and engage with this next wave of intelligent tech.
Success in this space is just as much about WHO you know as WHAT you know. Business models, pricing models and tech options are all over the map.  Working with both startups and enterprise companies, I’m typically engaged to play the role of coach, connector, advisor, promoter, investor, incubator and/or launch accelerator

As founder of The Institute of Robotic Process Automation and Artificial Intelligence, I’ve created the path to the largest viable RPA and AI ecosystem in the market space. IRPA AI provides expert insight, education, and networking to help buyers, providers and advisors navigate the rapidly changing landscape of automation solutions.

Over the years I have had the opportunity to meet thousands of key players in the industry. This puts me in the unique position of being just 1 degree of separation away from most of the leaders and influencers in the RPA and AI market space. It’s always a pleasure when I can connect a start-up and an investor or introduce a company to their newest talent. Please don’t hesitate to connect with me on LinkedIn or introduce yourself at one of the many industry events we produce each year.

name: Jonathan Flack
title: Professional Problem Solver | Distinguished Cloud & Security Architect (L8), SRE focused ZT Pioneer, Distributed & Accelerated Computing Veteran. Cloud Security Alliance Author/Editor. Offshore sailor #OpsSec #ZeroTrust
about:
Highly driven Senior Executive who excels at precisely identifying needs, developing effective solutions, and delivering immediate, strategically aligned results.

I cultivate an environment of shared responsibility, blameless continuous improvement, and strong ownership across teams. My primary focus is the architectural design of multiple "security-first" cloud-native platform ecosystems (operating at scale) within Google Cloud Platform (GCP) and Azure, with a strong emphasis on GCP. I am engaged in multiple ongoing DoD collaborations and hold an active security clearance.

Featured Speaker: AFCEA West 2025, DOD SAP Conference 2025, Google Next 2025

Cloud Security Alliance (CSA) Zero Trust Working Groups: A leading contributor and author in Identity and Access Management, Cloud Security Services, and Enterprise Architecture; active member of the CSA Zero Trust Expert Working Group.

I possess deep expertise in securely migrating large-scale platforms to zero trust and cloud-native environments, with a specialized focus on designing secure, end-to-end cloud ecosystems for the US Department of Defense. My extensive work at the Air Force Research Laboratory and close collaborations with the DoD CIO's ZT PfMO have equipped me with a unique ability to embed security into cloud migrations from their foundation. I champion concepts such as idempotence, immutability, Risk & Compliance as Code (RCaC), and Security-as-Code (SaC), extending a broader Infrastructure-as-Code (IaC) strategy through a Supply Chain Security and Zero Trust lens (NIST 800-218 & 800-207). This approach ensures an analyzable Zero Trust infrastructure with continuously verifiable controls, firmly rooted in Site Reliability Engineering (SRE).

My commitment to securing AFRL involved proactive measures through code and policy-based procedures to protect against vulnerabilities, leveraging a deep understanding of software supply chain security and secure software delivery (NIST 800-218). I consistently prioritize inherently secure, loosely-coupled designs with a high degree of observability, resilient managed infrastructure, and strict adherence to Cloud Native best practices, Infrastructure as Code (IaC), and security and manageability by design.

In all large-scale architectural efforts, I am guided by three core principles: Shared Responsibility, Shared Outcome, Cloud Native by Design, API-First, and Secure by Design.

name: Joseph Vangieri
title: CEO at DigiTrax AI
about:
Joseph Vangieri, CEO; a serial entrepreneur who has led the development, launch, and branding of "first of its kind" music performance products. 

He helmed the R&D, patenting, licensing, marketing, and manufacture of the first digital DJ software package and launched the karaoke industry’s premier streaming platform, PCDJ was sold to D1 Media in 2006.  

In 2007 Mr Vangieri founded Victory Media Works, a consultancy firm specializing in implementing turnaround marketing strategies for companies in the music industry. Victory Media Works then led Mr Vangieri to becoming CEO of DigiTrax Entertainment, LLC, to exploit the company's catalog assets (10,000 music masters). 

Mr Vangieri digitized the entire catalog in order to market and sell the content utilizing modern technology, and expanded the company’s reach by entering the professional karaoke market with an API that multiple, third-party professional hosting software developers used to directly integrate the catalog with their products via a subscription model. 

Since 2017 Mr Vangieri is pioneering DigiTrax AI Artificial Intelligence technology, set to disrupt the $15B music creation market. 

He is an expert in Lean Startup methodology and is a graduate of William Paterson University with a BA in Math & Natural Science and a BA Communications Radio & TV.

name: John Foster
title: CEO - CloudSphere
about:
Proven leader with a track record of building and scaling successful technology companies, I'm currently CEO of CloudSphere.  
CloudSphere’s core platform, Illuminate360, performs agentless, automated scanning across the entire IT estate – multi-cloud, hybrid, and on-premises environments - to provide comprehensive IT visibility.  Illuminate360 discovers and identifies servers, applications and cloud services and maps relationships and interdependencies to create service maps that provide granular visualizations of the estate by business service. 
We’re now deploying our mature, proven platform to detect instances of shadow AI applications that have proliferated across many enterprise networks.  These unmanaged AI instances create a growing security concern for CISOs who lack visibility into where they are running, who is using them and what threats they pose to enterprise data. 
CloudSphere discovers and identifies these applications, as well as the network topology surrounding them to provide comprehensive IT visibility for security teams.

name: Eliott Teissonniere
title: Building 🤖
about:
Eliott Teissonniere is a polymath, engineer and entrepreneur. He used to be the CTO of BitNation, a governance and crypto company which was rewarded by the NetExplo prize from UNESCO in 2017, made the world’s first marriage dApp on Ethereum and leads Nodle's Blockchain and Engineering teams for which he co-invented multiple pending and granted patents. He was featured in various medias for his work on decentralized governance and blockchains such as Decrypt, CoinTelegraph and CoinDesk; and spoke at multiple high profile events such as the Paris Blockchain Week, the Stanford Blockchain Conference and presented in front of the European commission with past European deputies on the subject of Covid-19 tracing via the Blockchain. He is a mentor at the Berkeley Blockchain Accelerator and advises various crypto and technology startups via his company Nuclei Studio. He cofounded in 2020 the Governance Research Institute to research new governance models for companies, communities and governments.

The Nodle network connects the world by using smartphones as nodes to create a digital trust network for social good. Nodle enables unique applications that can leverage the network for things like public safety, sourcing trusted user generated content, locating assets or accessing remote sensors. The Nodle network is decentralized, secure, private, and scalable making it perfect for digital witnesses, smart missions and micro-transactions. Anyone with a smartphone can join the Nodle network today. Download Nodle on iOS or Android and visit us at nodle.com.

name: Micha Anthenor Benoliel
title: Co-Founder & CEO at Nodle
about:
Micha's passion for technology ignited at age 8 when he taught himself how to code a flight simulator in Basic on a Zenith PC. He later wrote his first games on classic platforms like the Texas Instrument TI 99 4A, ATARI 512ST, and Amiga 500. Over the past two decades, Micha has been at the forefront of disruptive communications technologies and has been pivotal in launching VoIP services that have transformed the industry. His work with Skype, where he enabled the launch of SkypeIn and SkypeOut, was instrumental in scaling the platform's monetization, setting the stage for its global success.
In 2011, Micha co-founded Open Garden, a groundbreaking venture that redefined mobile networking through mesh networking technology. Open Garden's FireChat app became a global sensation in 2014, reaching the top ten apps in 124 countries by enabling off-the-grid communication through peer-to-peer mesh networking. 
Seven years ago, Micha embarked on the Nodle journey, applying his expertise in decentralized networks to create a digital trust network for the era of generative AI. Nodle now empowers individuals and organizations to verify the authenticity of data and digital content leveraging blockchain technology. With over a million users on its mobile wallet and a growing enterprise customer base—including Vivendi Group—Nodle has set the foundations to scale rapidly. Micha's vision continues to drive innovation at the intersection of technology, communication, and trust. Its latest Click mobile application ensures that what we see and share on the internet is real.
speaking_engagements: Interview at Permissionless III 2024; Guest on DePINed Fluence podcast
notable_achievements: Co-founder and CEO of Open Garden, creator of FireChat, a peer-to-peer messaging app that bypassed the Great Firewall of China; Co-founder of Nodle, a decentralized wireless network incentivizing connectivity; Co-founder of Blockchain.art, a digital platform for artists and collectors
reasoning: Micha Benoliel demonstrates a clear pattern of market innovation and thought leadership in communications technology. His work has created multiple disruptive technologies and platforms, particularly in mesh networking and decentralized communications. His contributions to Skype's monetization (SkypeIn/SkypeOut) and the success of FireChat (reaching top 10 in 124 countries) show significant market impact. He has consistently innovated in networking technology, from VoIP to mesh networks to blockchain-based trust systems, creating new market categories along the way. While not quite at the L7 level (which would require multiple $100M+ exits), his track record of creating and scaling innovative technologies places him solidly at L6.

Technology visionary that applies big data technology solutions to solve real-world business problems by generating intelligence and insight previously unavailable in the marketplace.   

The Savvy Businessman:
Oliver Deng is the Chief Financial Officer(CFO), Chief Product Officer(CPO), and co-founder of Salesify. Founded in 2005, Salesify is the leading sales acceleration company which has fueled its growth by helping companies identify the sales prospects for the leading technology companies, publishers, and agencies in the world.   

As CFO, he oversaw consistent and profitable growth since inception without the benefit of outside funding.  Salesify had 28M in annual revenue in 2015 and was acquired by Ziff Davis/J2 Global in 2015. Oliver possesses a unique array of talent, skills, and knowledge that sets him apart from his peers and drives his success.  This repertoire of assets allowed him to successfully fulfill his roles as CFO and CPO, leading the delivery of a new product platform while driving the thirteen-fold revenue growth of Salesify from ‘09-‘15. 

Oliver as CPO, he led the development of two visionary platforms, TechLeads Online, and B2B Signals, the industry’s only large-scale platform with the depth and breadth of contacts, product install base, and sales intelligence.  Oliver’s vision was to leverage the power of technology via social listening, machine learning, natural language processing) and human insight provided by a data analyst team to tap into the power of big data to generate B2B sales intelligence.

name: Steve Latham
title: Founder & CEO of Canopy | Automate Remote Device Management for Connected Products
about:
I am the Founder and CEO of Canopy, a company dedicated to revolutionizing the way Connected Products are monitored and managed. At the heart of our mission is the drive to provide next-generation remote monitoring and management software for the ever-expanding market of Connected Products. Canopy is not just a software platform; it's a testament to the power of innovation and pursuit of excellence in preventing downtime and ensuring the reliability of these products.

Over the last decade, the buildout of Canopy has touched every part of the entrepreneurial journey, from navigating market challenges and technological advancements to refining our business strategy and fostering a culture of innovation. These experiences and lessons learned have shaped our approach and fueled our progress. Our team's dedication and hard work have been the foundation of our success, and I am grateful for the commitment of everyone that has been a part of the journey so far.

Canopy's momentum is undeniable, yet our mission is far from complete. There is still much more work to be done, and we are more committed than ever to fulfilling our vision. Our collective aspiration is to see Canopy's success create meaningful opportunities for our employees, customers, partners, and the broader market. Each day is an opportunity to build not just a product and a company, but a legacy that will make a lasting impact on the industry.

name: Claire Lew
title: Founder & CEO @ Canopy |  Leadership Development
about:
👋 Howdy! Claire here, Founder & CEO at Canopy. Thanks so much for stopping by. 

My life’s mission is to help people become happier at work. This has shaped everything I do. Over the past decade, I’ve helped 50,000+ managers at companies like Amazon, Netflix, and Shopify through live sessions, tailored programs, and practical leadership tools.

My journey started over ten years ago, when my first client was 37signals, the creators of Basecamp. I went on to spin off a product they’d developed internally into a tool that became part of Canopy’s broader platform. Since then, I’ve distilled over 50 years of leadership research into frameworks that help leaders navigate complexity and lead with clarity, confidence, and care.

Along the way, I’ve coached leaders at Apple, Uber, and other leading companies through tough moments — team dynamics, performance challenges, scaling pains — and helped them find a way forward. I’ve also spoken at conferences and led leadership trainings around the world. My insights have been featured in Harvard Business Review, CNBC, Inc., and Fortune, and I’ve taught entrepreneurship at Northwestern University, my alma mater.

At Canopy, we help fast-moving organizations upskill their managers through:

🌱 Leadership Development Programs: Live, cohort-based training tailored to your org’s real-world challenges.

💬 Coaching & Advising: 1-1 support for leaders navigating high-stakes, high-complexity moments.

🎤 Speaking & Workshops: Keynotes and interactive sessions that spark clarity and shift culture.

📱 The Canopy App: A leadership improvement app that delivers personalized daily insights, just-in-time tools, and an AI Assistant for deeper support when complex challenges arise.

Outside of work, I paint in oils from my studio in Point Reyes, California, and live in the Bay Area with my husband.

If you’re thinking about how to better support your leaders — or just want to chat about what it means to lead well in fast-moving environments — I’d love to connect.

📩 claire@canopy.is  |   💌 newsletter.canopy.is (link in my profile)

name: Stephen Odaibo
title: CEO & Founder RETINA-AI Health, Inc. | Retina Specialist | Healthcare AI expert | Math/Comp Sci. | AI Engineer
about:
Dr. Stephen G. Odaibo is CEO and Founder of RETINA-AI Health, Inc. He is a Physician, Retina Specialist, Computer Scientist, Full Stack AI Engineer, and AI/ML expert.

Dr. Odaibo completed undergraduate in mathematics at Univ of Alabama (UAB) and medical school at Duke University, where he won the Barrie Hurwitz Award for Excellence in Neurology.  He completed ophthalmology residency at Howard and Retina fellowship at Univ of Michigan.  In addition to his medical training, he holds Masters Degrees in both Mathematics and Computer Science.  In 2017, UAB college of Arts and Sciences awarded him the college’s highest honor--the UAB Distinguished Alumni Achievement Award.  Dr. Odaibo has authored three mathematics textbooks: "Quantum Mechanics and the MRI Machine" (2012),  "The Form of Finite Groups: A Course on Finite Group Theory" (2016), and most recently, "The Foundational Mathematics of Artificial Intelligence" (2024).

Dr. Odaibo has extensive experience in building AI systems and running AI ventures.  Dr. Odaibo is a hands-on full-stack AI/ML engineer and data scientist.  He is a Google Cloud-Certified Professional Cloud Cybersecurity Engineer.  He single-handedly built the world's first mobile AI application for eyecare providers.  He is CEO of RETINA AI—a venture where he and his team designed the RETINA-AI Galaxy for detection of diabetic retinopathy.  As CEO of RETINA-AI, he organized and managed the largest pivotal clinical trial ever done in the United States for an autonomous AI system.  His managerial role has garnered him extensive skill in recruitment and management of tech teams.  He additionally has expertise in the regulatory and legal aspects of AI-- Dr. Odaibo was awarded two U.S. patents for inventing AI systems for detecting disease from ophthalmic images.

His expertise has been sought out across the globe.  Dr. Odaibo chaired and ran the AI workshops at the Medical Device Software Development Summits in the United States (2022, 2023) and European Union (2023).  He has also shared his AI expertise in Asia. In 2019 Dr. Odaibo chaired the "Artificial Intelligence & Tech in Medicine Symposium" at the National Medical Association Meeting. He serves on the Advisory Board of the Duke University Masters of Engineering in Artificial Intelligence program.

Overall, Dr. Odaibo has extensive experience in AI at the technical, managerial, and regulatory levels.  He continues to see patients part time as a Retina Physician, and he enjoys the privilege of providing excellent care to his patients.
education_2_degree: Doctor of Medicine (M.D.), Internal Medicine Residency Program -- Intern year.
awards_and_recognitions: Distinguished Alumni Achievement Award from the College of Arts & Sciences (2017); Best Resident Research Presentation Award at the 23rd Annual Washington Retina Conference (2013); Barrie Hurwitz Award for Excellence in Clinical Neurology at Duke University School of Medicine (2005)

We are building an AI-powered platform that liberates and structures data on behalf of patients to radically improve rare and complex disease treatment, widen access to expert care, and revolutionize the development of new medicines at a fraction of the speed previously proven possible.  

We are looking for mission driven builders - join our team!

Previously, I co-founded Ciitizen, a patient-controlled platform for digitizing and sharing health information to improve treatments and accelerate research. After Ciitizen’s acquisition by Invitae in 2021, I led Invitae’s Patient Network and Data business. My start-up 'upbringing' began at ZL Technologies, an early pioneer in Big Data enterprise SaaS.

I love traveling, food, tennis and diving. But most of all, spending time with my wife, son and 11-pound maltipoo!

name: Bryan Angelo
title: CMO at Breakout | CPG Angel Investor
about:
Bryan Angelo is a seasoned executive with over a decade of experience managing and operating marketing and ad agencies servicing global and Fortune 100 clientele. He has deep expertise in market strategy and digital marketing transformation, with a proven track record in brand positioning and leveraging data to drive successful marketing operations. Bryan has worked with both established companies and startups, offering strategic guidance on data, technology, and growth.

Currently, Bryan serves as the Chief Marketing Officer for Breakout, a crypto-native prop firm trading on the best centralized exchange liquidity. He is also the Principal of Olegna Group, an investment and consulting firm focused on early-stage startups in the CPG, Crypto, and Software sectors.

With nearly a decade of experience as an executive in the beverage alcohol industry, Bryan co-founded an e-commerce software product in the global beverage alcohol industry, which was acquired in 2020. He also served as the SVP of Marketing for a prominent alcohol importer in NYC.

In addition to his professional pursuits, Bryan is actively involved in side projects, including investing in early-stage businesses through The Angel Group. He has served as an adjunct professor at Montclair State University and as a mentor for TechLaunch, a business accelerator program in New Jersey.

name: Arun Rao
title: GenAI Product Leader - Machine Learning at Meta, Adjunct Professor at UCLA | ex-Amazon | ex-PIMCO | raohacker.com
about:
Arun is a product leader at Meta's largest generative AI team, building frontier models like Llama and applying them to internal use cases and making them available as open source.  He focuses on evaluations today, supporting teams of PMs and engineers applying state-of-the-art ML to user problems, building generative AI systems, creating platforms, building and applying foundation models (like LLMs), dealing with regulatory and policy issues, and interfacing with cross-functional teams in UX, infrastructure, legal, etc.  In parallel, Arun serves as an adjunct professor at UCLA Anderson on advanced product development. As an expert in using machine learning to create new products or optimize existing ones, he specializes in leading cross-disciplinary teams to solve problems in recommender systems, search, genAI, and investing.

Previously, Arun was a Sr. Product Manager at Amazon Music's ML group, helping build a personalization and machine learning system for 80 million customers. Prior to that, he was a co-founder and CEO of Starbutter AI, a virtual assistant company (next-generation financial product aggregator) to help consumers pick financial products like credit cards, mortgages, and insurance. Earlier in his career, Arun was a quantitative trader and portfolio manager at PIMCO, focusing on MBS/ABS, high yield bonds, and derivatives.  He was part of an 11-person team that used a "free-style chess" approach with multiple humans and algorithms to manage $240+ billion in risky bonds and derivatives. 

Arun completed a JD/MBA dual degree at UCLA Anderson and the University of Arizona College of Law, after undergraduate dual degrees in Quantitative Finance at Wharton and Classics at Upenn. He has studied, presented, and extensively written on various topics on advanced machine learning and product development, including a book titled "A History of Silicon Valley."  He is a proven leader, with past and continued impact roles in the investment, music, fintech, shopping, and adtech spheres.

In his spare time, Arun enjoys exploring the great outdoors, practicing yoga, and thinking about big problems at the intersection of media, science, commerce, technology, education, and society.  He is interested in equitably advancing AI/ML systems and well-being across the globe.

name: Aditya Menon
title: CEO Tallyx | Strategic Advisor NetXD Inc. |  Board Member UrbanFT | Web3 | BaaS | KeyNote Speaker | Supply Chain Finance | Payments | Digital Assets | Tokenization | Custody | Digital Transformation
about:
Aditya is a serial entrepreneur with a focus on digital assets, digital asset custody, blockchain, transaction banking, retail banking, and payments. He has served as a co-founder and CTO, with two successful exits to SunGard and ACI. He was also a Global Managing Director of Citi Digital Strategy from 2011-2018 where he led digital transformation across both consumer and corporate bank as well as next-generation cloud, API, and microservices architecture.
As a global head of product management at Obopay, he drove mobile payments and financial inclusion in various regions. This included initiatives such as Nokia Money in India, Yu Cash in Kenya, Warid Pesa in Uganda, Yoban Tel in Senegal (in partnership with SocGen), and MasterCard MoneySend in the USA.
Aditya has helped to raise over $100mm in venture/strategic funding across multiple startups.
He was the first Chief Information Officer (CIO) at Yes Bank and the first Global CIO at Mphasis. He is recognized as a pioneer in digital and electronic banking, having implemented projects for institutions such as RBC, ABN, OCBC, DBS, and K-Bank.
He has extensive hands-on experience designing and building trade and supply chain finance digital tokens, issuance of regulated digital assets, and institutional custody platforms.

name: Katie Flannery
title: Entrepreneur • Business Development • Sales & Partnerships • Recruitment • Start-Ups • Research Analyst • Business Strategist • Messaging Expert
about:
A 2019 Female Executive of the Year for Women in Business, Katie Flannery is a multi-exited founder and entrepreneur with a track record of innovating to drive growth, partnerships, and process improvements within recruitment, venture-backed tech, and IP-driven startups. Katie brings 11+ years of recruitment & executive search expertise coupled with 7+ years as an executive herself founding, fundraising, incubating and exiting companies in Recruiting/HR Tech, Retail Tech, Interactive Packaging, and CPG Data Analytics.

Katie has created several multi-million-dollar businesses from the ground-up and steered through exit/M&A, including as Co-Founder and Head of Partnerships at solo sciences inc, a CPG tech platform acquired in 22 months by a strategic partner, a first-of-its-kind SaaS company to IPO on NASDAQ.

As the first external hire at SThree Americas Chicago in 2012, Katie rapidly became an award-winning Top Biller, having successfully launched the region's first FDA-regulated life sciences recruitment practice and grown it to the most profitable team in the company. Katie initiated partnerships across the entire C-suite at several Fortune 100 Life Sciences companies that ultimately became key accounts globally.

Most recently, Katie led the end-to-end sourcing and execution strategy for Broad Street Consulting Group, a boutique retained executive search firm specializing in DE&I recruitment for highly specialized senior-level investment positions at the world’s most influential banks, asset managers, and investment firms.

Katie earned a Bachelor of Science in Neuroscience (Pre-Med) from Indiana University, Bloomington and is an AIRS Certified Diversity and Inclusion Recruiter (CDR) since 2023.

Based in the Tetons in Jackson Hole, Wyoming, Katie is an avid skier, musician, and world traveler.

name: Babak Shafei, Ph.D.

about:
A seasoned leader with 15+ years of experience driving $110M+ in global energy, water, and carbon projects through technical and engineering solutions. As the Founder & CEO of AquaNRG, I lead a team of experts pioneering geoenergy and environmental technology solutions for complex subsurface applications. I have successfully directed B2B operations, strategic planning, product development, and market expansion, ensuring the seamless integration of cutting-edge technology with industry demands.

Our expertise includes shale IOR, CCUS, CDR, deep geological nuclear waste repositories, and subsurface hydrogen production and storage, all powered by AI-enhanced, cloud-based high performance computing, and interdisciplinary approaches in physics, biogeochemistry, and data science.

I have also served as a Principal Scientist at Eawag and Project Manager at World Bank's $70M sustainable and safe landfill design, contributing to aquatic ecosystems, water management, and environmental sustainability. 

My passion is leveraging BIG DATA enhanced by AI, BIG COMPUTE powered by high-performance cloud computing, and BIG SCIENCE built on physics and biogeochemistry to create scalable, high-impact solutions for the energy and environmental markets.

name: Jeff Schumann
title: Head of Brand @ Mimecast (fmr. CEO Aware)
about:
Before graduating college, Jeff was already on the front lines of cyber intelligence, collaborating with the CIA during the post-9/11 era to intercept terrorist communications on the dark web, as the U.S. intensified its hunt for Osama bin Laden and dismantled Al-Qaeda’s digital infrastructure. From there, he rose fast, leading enterprise collaboration strategy for a Fortune 50 company.

Jeff’s most defining chapter began when he co-founded Aware, an AI-powered cybersecurity company built to detect human risk in modern collaboration platforms. Backed by Goldman Sachs, Aware raised over $100M in venture funding and became a trusted partner to some of the world’s most iconic brands. The company’s growth ultimately led to a successful acquisition by Mimecast — marking one of the most notable cybersecurity exits in recent years.

Now at Mimecast, Jeff wears many hats, driving AI strategy, brand transformation, and innovation across the company’s global platform.

Beyond the corporate world, Jeff serves on several boards, including the Center for Software Innovation at The Ohio State University, where he’s helping shape the Midwest into the next great capital of American innovation.

name: Malvina Eydelman, MD
title: CEO | Visionary Leader in Medical Product Innovation | Advocate for Collaborative Healthcare Transformation
about:
I am a physician, innovator, and global advocate for advancing medical products and patient-centric solutions. 

As the Chief Executive Officer of the Collaborative Community on Ophthalmic Innovation (CCOI), I am committed to uniting all stakeholders—patients and patient advocates, clinicians, researchers, regulators, industry leaders, and investors—to drive transformative change in eye care.

With three decades of leadership at the U.S. Food and Drug Administration (FDA), I spearheaded groundbreaking initiatives to ensure the safety, effectiveness, and timely availability of medical products. 
My expertise spans ophthalmology, ENT, neurology, anesthesia, respiratory, and dental sectors.

I have led multidisciplinary teams in regulatory science, policy development, and clinical research, helping shape global standards and industry guidance. Passionate about fostering collaboration, I have organized international symposia and public-private partnerships to accelerate innovation.

As an Adjunct Professor at Stanford’s Byers Eye Institute, I mentor the next generation of innovators, equipping them with the skills to bring breakthrough technologies to market. 

I am a member of several advisory and editorial boards, including JAMA Ophthalmology, the Eye & Contact Lens Journal, the Asia-Pacific Academy of Ophthalmology AI and Digital Innovation Committee, Ophthalmology Futures Forums, and the EnVision Summit.

I am always eager to collaborate with forward-thinking professionals dedicated to shaping the future of global health care. Let’s connect and innovate together!

about:
I'm an entrepreneur with a passion for experimentation toward solving hard problems and making a real difference in people's lives. I believe scientific and technological innovation are the critical path to a fairer & happier world, but only if paired with a commitment to creating equality and sustainability. In everything I do I try to emphasize empathy, honesty, and gratitude. Authentic connections are always welcome. 

I have ten years of experience as a founder, CEO, and head of growth, building and scaling innovative products and teams in the fields of neuroscience, wearable technology, and now applied AI. I have raised over $6M in funding, led multiple product launches, and established strategic partnerships with leading organizations and investors, from UCSF to the United States Airforce.

At MindsDB, I am responsible for driving the growth and awareness of the fastest growing applied AI/ML project in the world, an open source tool that makes data science and building ML/AI applications drastically easier. I am passionate about democratizing and simplifying ML/AI development, and I leverage my skills in public relations, business development, and community engagement to this mission.

name: Gerwin Schalk
title: Scientist, Engineer, and Entrepreneur
about:
Accomplished academic entrepreneur specialized in machine learning and software engineering applied to neurotechnology and FinTech.

Ever since I watched the 1982 movie "Firefox" with Clint Eastwood that features a fighter jet with thought-controlled weapons, I have been dreaming to use a machine to decode thoughts and emotions from human biosignals, and to use the results for important applications. To pursue this dream, I first acquired a strong academic background in computer technology, signal processing, AI/machine learning, and biosignals, and then leveraged that background to produce leading academic research.  This research demonstrated that humans can control machines just by thinking and showed that it is possible to decode important information from brain signals. 

I am now applying this unusual background to develop neurotechnologies to improve people's lives by bringing them closer to machines.

Passionate about technology and people

name: Brian Vigeant
title: CoFounder & CEO at CultureHQ | Father of 2 boys | Authentic storytelling in the age of AI
about:
Before I started CultureHQ, I was busy having fierce rivalries on the ping pong table with Jimmy Hall and many other Forresterites.

When Jimmy Hall and I started CultureHQ, we were passionate about the power of employees forming meaningful connections and its impact on culture, performance, retention, and more.

After 3 years of helping employees share stories that helped them connect with one another internally, we realized there was a bigger opportunity.

One where the stories were not just for employees internally, but for the external world too. A company’s culture when showcased through the lens of their employees is one of the most powerful talent attraction and brand building tools out there.

Some of the world’s most recognizable brands like Microsoft, Comcast, RTX, and more are leaning on CultureHQ to help their employees stories shine.

And now today, there is even more potential. An employee’s personal brand has become not just a magnet for talent, but for customers too.

Regardless of your business size, you need to empower your people to be creating content that’s authentic and compelling.

The old ways of getting your brand known has fundamentally changed. Let CultureHQ help you tell your story to win the best talent and customers.

Want to learn more? DM and I’d be happy to chat!

name: Todd Spears
title: Predictable Pipeline Growth for Agencies | Buyer Intent Data Expert | Automation and Systems Strategist |
about:
As an AI automation expert and buyer intent data strategist, I help scaling agencies and service businesses stop chasing cold leads—and start closing warm ones.

If you’re tired of outreach that doesn’t convert, burning time on unqualified leads, or tools that promise results but deliver noise—I’m here to help.

I specialize in combining high-intent lead data (people actively searching for what you sell) with AI-powered system enhancements that handle follow-up, nurturing, and conversion—without the manual grind.

Here’s how I support growth-focused agencies and sales teams:

🔹 Buyer Intent Data Integration – find prospects already researching your offer and get them into your funnel fast
🔹 AI Follow-Up Systems – automate personalized outreach that feels human, responds instantly, and boosts conversion rates
🔹 Smart Lead Nurturing – stop guessing who’s ready to buy; start engaging at exactly the right moment
🔹 Sales Workflow Automation – streamline tasks, eliminate bottlenecks, and let your team focus on closing
🔹 Predictable Pipeline Growth – no more cold lists or spray-and-pray outreach—just a steady flow of qualified leads

If your lead gen strategy isn’t giving you consistent, qualified conversations—let’s fix that.

about:
I believe technology should improve people’s lives, which is why I dedicated the last 8 years to developing a user-friendly pricing platform for retail teams. During my career, I’ve worn many hats, from individual entrepreneur, startup founder, product development expert, audit and IT consultant, and Competera founder. 

Competera is an AI-driven pricing platform providing retail teams with a unified workstation to manage pricing efficiently and hassle-free. Becoming a 2023 VIP Awards winner in Best Retail Insights category, Competera has already helped retailers like Sephora, Tegut, Flaconi, Fragrance outlet, Staples, FCP Euro, and more to:

- Switch to category-level pricing for each repricing cycle.
- Manage pricing for any number of pricing lists fast and efficiently
- Get optimal prices within a couple of clicks.
- Boost bottom-line metrics and save human resources.

I love learning and sharing my knowledge with others and infusing every bit of my expertise into the product we develop at Competera. All for the sake of helping retailers prosper regardless of the changing reality, buying behavior, and ever-increasing challenges. I am always open to connecting with new people. May you have a pricing question to find an answer to, a challenge to solve, or want to engage in an insightful conversation - don’t hesitate to drop me a line!

That's how Competera was founded in 2014. Since that time, we bring a goal-driven approach to modern category management.

Our ML-powered solution helps retail businesses to build the right price perception through advanced analytics at the junction of pricing, assortment management, and marketing. 

We are happy to help Staples, Mothercare, Watsons, Media Markt, FMAG, and other 120+ retailers in 28 countries to entice customers and excel in the market with optimal prices.

name: Lanny Rutkin
title: Creating AI innovations to build the next evolution of shopping
about:
Over the years I have been considered a visionary and have acted on some visions a few times. My current endeavor, Click Deal Buy! remains in stealth mode and soon we will come out of hiding. People tell me how passionate I am and I don’t give up after some doors are closed or the walls are caving in around me. Perseverance is my middle name. 

Having a strong background in account management for large companies or being creative about marketing is great. But my true passion is being an entrepreneur. My successes and failures could make an interesting book. I have failed only to get back up, and learn from my mistakes to try again. It’s ok to fail as long as you do learn and adapt not to make the same mistakes. 

Over the years I have invented and built products and companies from scratch. Successes and failures. Some years ago, before AI became mainstream, I had an idea, a vision about shopping. The business plan is so large and so important, why haven’t I released any software? Being pre-product and pre-revenue is the worst position to be in when raising funding. I admit, I made mistakes listening to those who promised me the world only to realize greed in others gets in the way of success. I persevered. 

Once I asked many investors and business leaders if age matters. No! was the answer. I should be retired. Click Deal Buy! is so important to e-commerce and commerce, that there was no way I would give up. The biggest lesson is to never give up on a dream. 

We, as a team, are very close to raising the necessary funds to launch Click Deal Buy! With little or no money, we’ve managed to get prototypes built, and software designed, and we met the right people to take us to the next level. The right people stopped and investigated me, my team, and of course our master business plan. The goal is to make Click Deal Buy! a household name and to drive business back to Main Street, down the street, across towns and cities. More importantly, part of our DNA is to give some of our profits to communities in need. 

For some 32 years, I worked in the Audio Visual IT Industry, starting in 1984. I held a variety of positions that have prepared me where I am today. One of the most important parts of a business I learned is Customer Service! If an error or problem happens, make it transparent as if it never happened. CDB! will have great customer service. 

On a personal note, I am a professional Deadhead having seen my first Grateful Dead concert in November of ’73. Music moves my soul. 

Don't let that deal go down...no no
reasoning: Based on the available information, this appears to be a nascent founder with an early-stage, pre-revenue company. While the founder has significant work experience in the Audio Visual IT industry (32 years mentioned), there is no concrete evidence of previous successful startups, exits, or significant entrepreneurial achievements. The current venture (Click Deal Buy!) is described as being in stealth mode, pre-product, and pre-revenue, seeking initial funding. The founder's description focuses heavily on aspirational language and future potential rather than demonstrable entrepreneurial achievements.
